input.sentences: today we had our annual family reunion . there were fun and games and many competitions like tug of war .
one of the big events was the sack race . both my son and my daughter competed .
the kid raced hard | and my son ended up as the winner .
after that | there was the the three-legged race | which me and my wife won .
finally we ended the day with food and swimming in the pool . everyone had fun .
output.sentences: Everyone is getting ready for todays field day activities
First up is the potato sack race
And after a brutal race we have the top 4 winners
Next up the three legged Race.
and the final event, the piggy back swim!
